column1: Little Goat Diner////Being a party of 1 and only having time for one meal here
column2: there was no way I could order everything I wanted to try. I ended up with the Los Drowned - a french dip-esque sandwich but elevated and FAR better. The Los Drowned come with braised beef (that basically melts in your mouth)
column6: and spicy mayo on a hoagie. I mean. Sound simple
column7: but nononono - it was HEAVENLY. I've never had a sandwich so satisfying for my soul. It was life changing
